website_summaries.verdict: These markers are a favorite among wine drinkers. A quality product that customers trust.
pros: 5 metallic colors show up clearly on glass and stand out against both red and white wine
Once dry, the marker is long-lasting but washes off quickly with a damp towel or in the dishwasher
Ink goes on smoothly and evenly without any dripping
cons: Marker tips are wide and not ideal for intricate designs

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: Just hosted a party with 30 people and these markers made sure everyone knew what glass was theirs. Wine charms are great but I didn’t have 30 wine charms and I think it gets difficult to remember which charm is yours. Even after many bottles of wine people still remembered their name on the glass. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: James O. Morris

customer_reviews.title: They do the job
customer_reviews.text: I used these to write my table assignments for my wedding and they were perfect. They didn't rub off easily if you happened to brush them lightly with a hand or a napkin but if you used window/glass cleaner they wipped off clean and easily. Perfect for what I needed them and colors were bold
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Winner, winner
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these markers. I like to write silly things on my glasses, so when people get one out of the cabinet they have something to smile about. customer_reviews.author: bw

customer_reviews.title: Almost prefect!
customer_reviews.text: These markers are actually pretty awesome. When used on a dry glass that did not yet have liquid in it, the marker ink dried quickly and did not smear. After adding liquid, as long as there wasn't tons of condensation, they worked great. My main complaint was that only the silver marker didn't dry well, smeared a lot even after waiting 10mins, and was a pain to wash off the glass. I bought two packs and had this issue with both silver markers. Overall, a classy way to notate glassware.
customer_reviews.author: CrystalG

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Non-smudging, long-lasting and washed off in the dishwasher after several weeks. I thought I'd leave it on one of my glasses for weeks and see how it washed off, no problem at all. I only wrote on glasses before the wine was poured in or above the liquid line and had no issue with smudging. I love these pens, it's so fun to write messages or names on the glasses.

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant at all

customer_reviews.title: Not bad...

It does have a metallic shimmer to it and it's fun having the different colors for your guests to choose from. I'd still recommend however I'm not sure it's worth the money.
